reviewText:
I love both of these movies and laugh so hard while watching them.  Jennifer Aniston is awesome in these movies and is so out of the characters that she usually plays, it was refreshing to see her in this role.

If you want to laugh you should get these movies
I was happy to be able to buy both movies for my husband as a set. We laughed hysterically throughout both movies. A little raunchy but not overly so. Great cast.
